akas: Un asesino en la familia Spain
akas from release info: Un asesino en la familia Spain

1.title: Bloody Valentine
1.plot: Police are confronted with a grisly Valentine's Day surprise when a bullet-riddled body is found in a family home. With the usual suspects all sporting alibis, detectives follow a trail of secrets, manipulation, and betrayal to arrive at the truth.

2.title: A Deadly Education
2.plot: In Yale, Michigan, police responding to a home invasion find one family member dead and another in critical condition. It doesn't take long for detectives to start suspecting the culprit could be someone very close to home.

3.title: Burning Love
3.plot: In Ore City, Texas, firefighters extinguish a burning truck, only to reveal the charred remains of a human corpse inside. It soon becomes apparent this was no accident and that there's something very evil at play.

4.title: A Killing in Rotation
4.plot: In Pueblo, Colorado, police are called to a horrific scene after a fire reveals charred fragments of a human corpse. As detectives work to track down the killer, their investigation uncovers cracks in the foundation of a large, multi-generational family.

5.title: Wasted Away
5.plot: In Logan, Ohio, investigators receive word someone has been kidnapped from their job at the bank driven off in a car that resembles a police cruiser. Eventually, detectives discover a very personal connection between the victim and the kidnappers.

6.title: Brothers in Arms
6.plot: In Queens, NYPD detectives discover a bullet-pierced body stuffed into the trunk of a car and quickly find themselves drawn into a dark tale of brotherhood, backstabbing, and betrayal.

7.title: Thanksgiving Day Charade
7.plot: On Thanksgiving, police officers are sent out on a welfare check and uncover an unthinkable triple homicide. To unmask the killer, detectives must uncover a victim's secrets and examine a hidden world of disinheritance, rage, and dark accusations.

8.title: Sex, Lies & Videotape
8.plot: A frantic 9-1-1 caller informs police he's found a family member dead. At first, it looks like a simple case of suicide. But a deeper dig reveals a secret world of sex tapes, broken promises and unbelievable murder motives.

9.title: Deadtime Stories
9.plot: Police performing a welfare check stumble upon a brutalized body, hidden inside an Alabama home's quaint garden shed. The most shocking part? Another family member perished on this property just two days prior.

10.title: Fatal Fuse
10.plot: Police find a homeowner dead in their driveway riddled with bullets. Although one of the victim's family members claims to have witnessed the brutal attack, the alleged chain of events raises more questions than answers.

1.title: My Brother's Keeper
1.plot: The wealthy Heidt family are not immune from Daddy's playing favorites, and a brother having an affair with his sister-in-law--but murder??

2.title: Reap What You Sow
2.plot: When their lucrative family business begins to "bleed" money, how far will two siblings go for revenge?

3.title: Blood Is Thicker
3.plot: A graduation celebration turns into tragedy leaving only two family members alive. Was one of them the instigator?

4.title: Sins & Spurs
4.plot: Charisma Farm sounds like an attractive place, but disagreements about the horses turn it into a constant battleground. No one would expect the "final solution".

5.title: The Deep End
5.plot: In sunny Huntington Beach, California, the Mullinex's appear to be the quintessential all-American family. But when a body is found in a local harbor, a dark family history of alcohol abuse and addiction is revealed, culminating in a shocking murder plot.

6.title: The Ties That Bind
6.plot: Peter Montemayor raised his family through his trucking company. But his retirement sparks a fight between his siblings to control the business. In a tense story of kidnapping, greed and deceit, a conspiracy is revealed with a family member at its core.

1.title: Splitting Heirs
1.plot: In Laceyville, Pennsylvania, town barber Joe Colegrove and his wife Marlene are thought to be perfect parents with a knack for raising strapping sons. But when half the Colegrove family is slaughtered in their own beds, all eyes turn to the surviving kin.

2.title: Saints & Sinners
2.plot: In a wealthy suburb of San Diego, CA, divorce attorney Tim MacNeil and his new wife Doreen enjoy a charmed life with their two teenage children. When one MacNeil family member is brutally murdered, a blood relative's diobilical conspiracy surfaces.

3.title: The Lies That Bind
3.plot: In Tucson, Arizona, the Sanchez family, mom, dad and four beautiful daughters seem like an ideal family. But when the decomposed body of one member is found in the desert, investigators find a killer living very close to home.

4.title: Flesh and Blood
4.plot: In the beautiful town of Seminole, FL, the Kyne's appear to have discovered the secret to a harmonious life. But that's all shattered when police receive two frantic 9-1-1 calls from two separate Kyne family members - each accusing the other of murder.

5.title: Paging Doctor Death
5.plot: The Kazigo's have earned their great reputation. But when family secrets bubble to the surface in this suburban paradise, all roads lead to murder. A hunt for the victim's body leads investigators to unmask one family member hell-bent on revenge.

6.title: Family from Hell
6.plot: In suburban paradise Placentia, CA, a family does battle with cancer, never suspecting another killer lurks within their midst. With survivors pointing fingers at each other, police embark on an epic decade-long murder investigation.

7.title: Home Wrecker
7.plot: In the beautiful, seaside town of Cary, North Carolina, the Britts live a charmed existence. All that changes when the housing market crashes, igniting a blaze of greed that will leave one Britt Family member dead and another behind bars.

8.title: Lets Slay Together
8.plot: In Tampa, Florida, multimillionaire lottery winner Jeffrey Dampier is living the American dream and sharing the wealth with his extended family. But lady luck can be fickle, and this family's red-hot winning streak is soon to end in cold-blooded murder.

9.title: Dead Over Heels
9.plot: In the sleepy town of Bridgeville, Delaware, the beautiful autumn is interrupted by a mysterious disappearance. As investigators dig deeper, the Charbonneau family's disturbing secrets are revealed...at the bottom of a shallow grave.

10.title: Cradle to Grave
10.plot: In the city of Rock Hill, South Carolina, the Robertson family seems to have it all: wealth, success, and two loving sons. No one suspects there are dark secrets locked within their home's brick wall; or that one family member's greed will lead to murder.

11.title: Buzz Kill
11.plot: When a quiet Connecticut town is shaken by the brutal murder of one of its most colorful citizens, investigators uncover a complex murder plot with a little girl at its dead center.

12.title: Rest in Pieces
12.plot: In the idyllic lakeside town of Nice, Calif., Don and Mary Ann Duvardo seem to have it all: a dream home and three thriving children. But someone in the family is living a tangled web of lies. Soon, resentment and greed drive one blood relative to murder.

13.title: Devil Went to Georgia
13.plot: In idyllic Tifton, GA the Evans families run a charming flower shop, a successful trucking business, and live seemingly perfect lives. But when infidelities threaten this family's bliss, desperate attempts to stick together end in murder.

1.title: Duct Tape Divorce
1.plot: For the DeWilds of Edgewater, CO, family always comes first. But when one DeWild threatens to break that bond, they find the only way out of this family is murder.

2.title: House of Lies
2.plot: The Jackson family of Borger, Texas shares the same traditional American values as their neighbors. But a dark family secret reveals at least one Jackson is a wolf in sheep's clothing poised to thin the family flock...by murder.

3.title: 4 Women & a Funeral
3.plot: For the DeWilds of Edgewater, CO, family always comes first. But when one DeWild threatens to break that bond, they find the only way out of this family is murder.

4.title: Murder Mansion
4.plot: In the town of Libertyville, IL, Bruce and Darlene Rouse appear to have everything: wealth, success and three wonderful children. But behind closed doors, a toxic mix of scorn, jealousy, and greed is about to boil over into a scene of shocking carnage.

5.title: Home Sweet Homicide
5.plot: The forward-thinking Santaguida family enjoys a healthy, natural lifestyle in the hippie haven of Evergreen, Colorado. But when one family member is found brutally strangled, homicide detectives discover this peaceful image is all smoke and mirrors.

6.title: Don't Kill the Messenger
6.plot: The Milo family's Akron, Ohio based cosmetics supply chain is one of the biggest in the country. But beauty only goes skin deep, and an internal fight for company control will expose an ugly underbelly of conspiracy, lies, and murder.

7.title: Hell's Belles
7.plot: The Allman sisters have deep roots in their tight-knit Oakland community. When drug dealers threaten the neighborhood, the family decides to stand their ground. But after their house goes up in flames, one family member hides a smoldering secret.

8.title: He Said, She's Dead
8.plot: With a Coral Gables mansion and membership to the local yacht club, life's a beach for accountants Ed and Maggie Locascio. But when suspicion and infidelity threatens to break family bonds, one family member will be hit by the death tax.

9.title: Kiss Kiss, Bang Bang
9.plot: The Byrom family of Iuka, Mississippi (pronounced eye-ooka), seem to have it all: love, success, and plenty of Southern charm. They have some very dark secrets;. a penchant for sordid sex and a passion for poison result in murder.

10.title: Desperate House Knives
10.plot: The Bautista family of Riverside, CA is living the American dream with a nice home and two hard-working sons. But that dream will soon become a nightmare as one Bautista threatens to sever family ties and somebody loses their head.

11.title: Southern Helle
11.plot: For Starkville, Mississippi couple Joey and Kristi Fulgham, friends and family are one and the same. But when small town hospitality leads to dangerous liaisons, one family member decides the only way out is murder.

12.title: So Lonesome I Could Die
12.plot: In the small town of Munster, Indiana, the Levine family real estate business is flying high. But life for these jetsetters is about to hit some turbulence as brotherly love turns into backstabbing, revenge...and murder.

13.title: The Widowmaker
13.plot: Barry and Anita Ford seem to have it all: success, happiness, and loving in-laws George and Jill. But behind closed doors, envy and rumored-flirtation generate toxic hostility-culminating with one Ford executed in a remote industrial park.

1.title: Fresh Heir
1.plot: In the Houston heat a lawyer and his large family enjoy the high life. One member gets too greedy, though, and sparks a multi-generational war that ends in murder. It takes an entire police force, and one sexy sleuth to uncover the shocking truth.

2.title: Dead in the Water
2.plot: Mountainous Salt Lake City is where two brothers call home. Their airline cleaning business once overflowing with cash is now steadily failing. With eyes dead set on living the high life, one person in this family will be worth more dead than alive.

3.title: Cradle of Lies
3.plot: An unconventional family is dragged into the headlines after one of their own is brutally murdered in rural Beaver Dams, New York. When police realize it is an inside job, mothers, fathers and brothers turn against each other in a search for truth.

4.title: Till We Cheat Again
4.plot: Who is crying wolf? The estranged wife claiming to be stalked, and finding a mailbox pipe bomb? Or her rival whose pets are killed? Police finally believe the "tale" of the one who is murdered.

5.title: Witchful Thinking
5.plot: Chesapeake, Virginia is home to a tightknit, religious family. At a glance they look perfect, two beautiful daughters and a successful business - but this family is torn apart when one of them washes up along the banks of the Great Dismal Swamp.

6.title: Blood Is the New Black
6.plot: In the desert oasis of Tucson, Arizona, a beautiful, young family's quick climb up the corporate ladder has them flush with cash. But soon, deceit and a cold-blooded murder will turn this family's dream into a nightmare.

7.title: At the Stroke of Madness
7.plot: Following the events of the Susan Polk case leading up to the murder trial for the 2002 death of her husband, Dr. Frank "Felix" Polk. Polk's trial, described by one Associated Press correspondent as "circus-like", drew extensive media attention with its sensationalist elements.

8.title: I, Thee Dead
8.plot: California's Central Valley is one of "America's breadbaskets", but what are being harvested for one family are greed, lust, and murder. Financial issues and an unwanted pregnancy push one family member over the edge, and another into an early grave.

9.title: It's Your Funeral
9.plot: The rocky Cape Cod coastline is bathed in blood after one family's fight for a fortune turns deadly. The investigation uncovers liars, cheaters and even imposters on the dark path toward finding a killer in this modern day Greek tragedy.

10.title: A Brother's Blood
10.plot: A NASA contractor and his beautiful wife are living the dream with their three adopted children on the picturesque Maryland coast. Traditional parenting soon turns into military-style punishment and when the children start fighting back only a few members

11.title: No Rest for the Wicked
11.plot: A couple of recent "empty nesters" are finally able to enjoy the fruits of decades of labor. Old vices come home to roost when one of the children doesn't quite make it on their own. Arguing escalates to deadly violence.

12.title: No Bones About It
12.plot: A twisted story of the "Pecan Queen," a family business and greed.

13.title: You'll Be the Death of Me
13.plot: In Dallas, Texas, one couple's love story has brought together a large blended family. Personal and professional lives intertwine in harmony... until jealousy and greed prove that one family member's true colors include "blood" red.

1.title: Rotten to the Core
1.plot: The heartland of Nebraska is not immune to murderous revenge. A once-happy family is frayed by anger and jealousy when an unlikely affair is revealed, and a scandalous tattoo seals the fate of more than one member of this family.

2.title: Mommy Dearest
2.plot: The suburbs of Detroit provide a comfortable backdrop for locals to build a life. One family though is quickly headed for disaster when affairs, lies, and explosive arguments lead someone to an early grave.

3.title: Death Is in the Heir
3.plot: Living in Little Washington, North Carolina means you've made it. For one member of a local family though, nothing is ever enough. Old family money combined with a get-rich-quick attitude put deadly targets on everybody's backs.

4.title: All Tied Up and Nowhere to Go
4.plot: Orange County, California is known for sun, sand and surf...and murder. A local family that has pulled itself from rags to riches will soon find it's luck has run out when murder comes knocking.

5.title: Rocking the Cradle
5.plot: In quiet, little Honesdale, Pennsylvania one family endures heartache, teen pregnancy and addiction, but keeps moving forward. It's only when someone from the past disturbs the delicate balance is murder in the midst.

6.title: Axe to Grind
6.plot: Montgomery, Alabama's upper crust social circle is about to play host to an uninvited party guest. Murder is on the menu when one family's distrust and finger pointing lead detectives on a cross-country trek for a killer.

7.title: Darkness Before Don
7.plot: The Blue Ridge Mountains of North Carolina make a perfect backdrop--for murder. Pillars of the community are pulled into a nightmare when affairs, abuse and embezzlement lead to someone losing their head.

8.title: Children of the Scorn
8.plot: The Pacific Northwest may be full of gloomy weather, but one local family sees only rainbows. Three generations of an established household appear to have it all until a stash of guns and a secret video reveals the face of a diabolical killer.

9.title: The Four Horsemen
9.plot: Bigfork, Montana is known for producing hearty men. Some are so rugged they seem programmed for murder. This tiny town will soon face not one--but two--murders, that appear random but are actually connected in a shocking way.

10.title: Clash of the Tartans
10.plot: Southern Oregon is a campers' paradise...but for one local businessman's family a weekend in the woods will become a nightmare. Open marriages and forbidden relationships will lead to someone's watery grave.

-1.title: S5 5.8 Hebert Case
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.title: Blood Relatives
plot: Real life cases about families and the murders that tore them apart.::ninagundel
